```{r}
download.file("http://tiny.cc/dcf/ScorecardSmall.Rda", destfile = "ScorecardSmall.Rda")
load("ScorecardSmall.Rda")
Collegeweb <- read.csv("http://tiny.cc/dcf/NPT4-names.csv")
Collegeweb
```

```{r}
graphdata <-
  ScorecardSmall %>%
  filter(CONTROL!=3) %>%
  select(ADM_RATE, CONTROL, NPT41_PUB, NPT43_PUB, NPT45_PUB, NPT41_PRIV, NPT43_PRIV, NPT45_PRIV) %>%
  gather(key=long_name,cost, - c(CONTROL, ADM_RATE)) %>%
  left_join(Collegeweb)
head(graphdata)
```



```{r}
ggplot(data=graphdata, aes(x=ADM_RATE, y=cost)) + geom_point() +facet_grid(CONTROL~short_name) + geom_smooth()
```
